contentrichtext.text: The '''Field of Mars''' was an area of the ancient city of Rome, the [[Campus Martius]]. '''Field of Mars''' or '''Mars Field''' may also refer to: *[[Champ de Mars|Field of Mars (Paris)]], An large public greenplace in Paris (front of [[Ã‰cole Militaire]]) *[[Pedion tou Areos|Field of Mars (Athens)]], A large public park in [[Athens]] *[[Field of Mars (Saint Petersburg)]], a square in Saint Petersburg, Russia *[[Field of Mars Reserve]], bushland in New South Wales, Australia **[[Field of Mars Fires]], 2002 brush fires at the Australian reserve *[[Mars (oil platform)|Mars field]], Gulf of Mexico oil field ==See also== *[[Mars (disambiguation)]] *[[Champ de Mars (disambiguation)]] *[[Campo de Marte Airport]] *[[Pedion Areos]] {{disambig}}
